- Do NOT add unrelated folders.

Create these minimal folders (use if not already present):

1) Edge/Backend (engine + policy + receipts + pc1 controls + glue):

- edge/m5_observability/

- edge/m5_observability/discovery/

- edge/m5_observability/checks/

- src/modules/m5_observability/

- src/modules/m5_observability/ui/

- src/modules/m5_observability/diagnostics/

- src/modules/m5_observability/quickfix/

- src/modules/m5_observability/receipts/

3) Tests (unit + integration + e2e; mirror layers):

- tests/m5_observability/edge/

- tests/m5_observability/extension/

- tests/m5_observability/e2e/

- tests/fixtures/m5_observability/

4) CI workflow:

- .github/workflows/

Now implement:

A) Generate PowerShell commands to create only missing directories.

B) Print a final tree view (only the folders above).

C) Do NOT create any other folders/files.

+ import * as vscode from 'vscode';

+ export function activate(context: vscode.ExtensionContext) {
+   const disposable = vscode.commands.registerCommand('zeroui.m5.openPanel', () =&gt; {
+     vscode.window.showInformationMessage('Module 5 Panel opened');
+   });
+ 
+   const treeDataProvider = new M5TreeDataProvider();
+   vscode.window.registerTreeDataProvider('zeroUI.view.main', treeDataProvider);
+ 
+   context.subscriptions.push(disposable);
+ }
+ 
+ export function deactivate() {}
+ 
+ class M5TreeDataProvider implements vscode.TreeDataProvider&lt;M5TreeItem&gt; {
+   getTreeItem(element: M5TreeItem): vscode.TreeItem {
+     return element;
+   }
+ 
+   getChildren(element?: M5TreeItem): Thenable&lt;M5TreeItem[]&gt; {
+     if (!element) {
+       return Promise.resolve([
+         new M5TreeItem('Module 5 not wired yet', vscode.TreeItemCollapsibleState.None)
+       ]);
+     }
+     return Promise.resolve([]);
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ class M5TreeItem extends vscode.TreeItem {
+   constructor(
+     public readonly label: string,
+     public readonly collapsibleState: vscode.TreeItemCollapsibleState
+   ) {
+     super(label, collapsibleState);
+   }
+ }

---

## 1) package.json

```json
{
  "name": "zeroui-m5",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "engines": {
    "vscode": "^1.80.0"
  },
  "main": "./dist/extension.js",
  "activationEvents": [
    "onStartupFinished"
  ],
  "contributes": {
    "commands": [
      {
        "command": "zeroui.m5.openPanel",
        "title": "Open M5 Panel"
      }
    ],
    "viewsContainers": {
      "activitybar": [
        {
          "id": "zeroUI.container",
          "title": "ZeroUI",
          "icon": "$(beaker)"
        }
      ]
    },
    "views": {
      "zeroUI.container": [
        {
          "id": "zeroUI.view.main",
          "name": "Main"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

---

## 2) tsconfig.json

```json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "module": "commonjs",
    "target": "ES2020",
    "outDir": "dist",
    "lib": ["ES2020"],
    "sourceMap": true,
    "strict": true,
    "rootDir": "src",
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*.ts"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules"]
}
```

---

## 3) src/extension.ts

```typescript
import * as vscode from 'vscode';

export function activate(context: vscode.ExtensionContext) {
  const disposable = vscode.commands.registerCommand('zeroui.m5.openPanel', () => {
    vscode.window.showInformationMessage('Module 5 Panel opened');
  });

  const treeDataProvider = new M5TreeDataProvider();
  vscode.window.registerTreeDataProvider('zeroUI.view.main', treeDataProvider);

  context.subscriptions.push(disposable);
}

export function deactivate() {}

class M5TreeDataProvider implements vscode.TreeDataProvider<M5TreeItem> {
  getTreeItem(element: M5TreeItem): vscode.TreeItem {
    return element;
  }

  getChildren(element?: M5TreeItem): Thenable<M5TreeItem[]> {
    if (!element) {
      return Promise.resolve([
        new M5TreeItem('Module 5 not wired yet', vscode.TreeItemCollapsibleState.None)
      ]);
    }
    return Promise.resolve([]);
  }
}

class M5TreeItem extends vscode.TreeItem {
  constructor(
    public readonly label: string,
    public readonly collapsibleState: vscode.TreeItemCollapsibleState
  ) {
    super(label, collapsibleState);
  }
}
```

---

**Summary:**
- ✅ 3 files created (no extras)
- ✅ package.json: main → `./dist/extension.js`, activationEvents → `["onStartupFinished"]`, command → `zeroui.m5.openPanel`, Activity Bar → `zeroUI.container` + view → `zeroUI.view.main`
- ✅ tsconfig.json: src → dist, sourceMap + strict enabled
- ✅ src/extension.ts: activate/deactivate, command registration with showInformationMessage, TreeDataProvider with "Module 5 not wired yet"
